basics.name: Saiprapul Thotapally
basics.label: AI Product Leader & Founder
basics.summary: AI Product Leader serving 6M merchants with 150K+ MAU processing 10M+ AI queries/month. Lead organization's Technical AI product team delivering $15M+ business value. Specialized in multi-agent systems, enterprise AI governance, and building backward from business constraints.

work.name: Global Payments
work.summary: Lead organization's Technical AI product team serving 6M merchants. Architecting AI platforms for scale and reliability in a highly regulated global environment.
highlights: Lead organization's AI product function: built weighted prioritization methodology to evaluate 350+ use cases, secured $7M+ executive investment for 14 funded bets, and architected 8 reusable platforms reducing delivery cost by 43%
Executed beachhead GTM strategy for Genius AI—scaled to 50,000+ merchant locations with 150K+ MAU processing 10M+ AI queries/month at 80% engagement, growing 12K users/month
Led AI Translation Platform end-to-end ($11M value: $6M cost savings + $5M revenue enablement) with 200%+ ROI
Shipped Agentic RAG system saving 24,000 hours annually ($2.4M value) through optimized internal document processing
Built automated fraud detection analyzing 5M+ daily transactions, delivering $1M+ annual savings with high precision
Developed and implemented the Complexity-Criticality Matrix for GenAI Governance, governing 50+ quarterly use cases across Legal and Risk teams

work.name: Aero Intelligence
work.summary: Multi-modal AI platform bringing Vision and Voice to field workers in construction and service industries.
highlights: Founded multi-modal AI platform optimized for hands-free field usage (Voice-first data entry)
Architected 5-agent system using LangGraph and Claude API, achieving 92.9% accuracy on technical document extraction (Boeing R&D validation)
Validated product-market fit in $2B+ TAB services market with paying pilot customers
Designed system architecture for reliability in low-connectivity environments, ensuring 80% time reduction for field reporting

work.name: Blue Cross Blue Shield
work.summary: Led digital transformation for clinical care workflows and referral management.
highlights: Generated $6M new revenue by converting manual phone-based referrals to high-efficiency virtual care workflows
Improved Nurse Practitioner coverage by 60% through a proprietary matching algorithm and load balancer
Reduced compliance reporting time by 50% through agile process redesign and automated data pipelines

projects.name: Aero Intelligence
projects.description: Multi-modal AI platform bringing Vision and Voice to field workers. Features a 5-agent layout built with LangGraph and Claude API.
projects.impact: 92.9% accuracy on Boeing R&D validation; 80% time reduction for field data entry.

projects.name: AI Portfolio Prioritization Framework
projects.description: Weighted scoring methodology for evaluating enterprise AI investments based on Internal Demand, Rinse & Repeat Potential, Customer Impact, Strategic Fit, and Feasibility.
projects.impact: Evaluated 350+ use cases to fund top 14 bets; secured $7M+ in executive funding.

projects.name: Complexity-Criticality Matrix for AI Governance
projects.description: Governance framework for determining AI oversight levels in compliance-heavy environments, published in IRJET 2024.
projects.impact: Governs 50+ quarterly use cases across Legal, Risk, Compliance, and Security.

projects.name: Consequence-Weighted AI Evaluation
projects.description: Evaluation methodology measuring AI systems by business impact of failure, not just standard accuracy metrics.
projects.impact: Reduced risk-adjusted delivery costs by identifying high-consequence edge cases early.

publications.title: AI Evals Handbook
publications.abstract: A comprehensive guide to evaluating AI systems over time focusing on Why, What, How, Keep, and Proof. Includes templates for RAG, agents, and drift monitoring.

publications.title: Complexity-Criticality Matrix for Enterprise GenAI Governance
publications.abstract: Governance framework for determining AI oversight levels classifying tasks by domain specificity and compliance impact.

publications.title: Generative AI Unveiled: Mechanisms, Biases, and Ethical Engagement
publications.abstract: Technical deep-dive into LLM architecture, training dynamics, and frameworks for responsible deployment.

principles.title: Start with the user's blocker, not the technology
principles.description: I don't ask 'what can AI do?'—I ask 'what's stopping this user right now?' The best products dissolve constraints users didn't know they had.

principles.title: Prioritize ruthlessly, then earn the buy-in
principles.description: Strategy isn't what you build. It's what you don't build. I use weighted prioritization to defend the discipline of saying 'no' to low-impact AI bets.

principles.title: Build platforms, not projects
principles.description: Projects solve problems once. Platforms solve them forever. I architect for reusability across shared services for ingestion, orchestration, and guardrails.

principles.title: Measure what matters when AI fails
principles.description: I measure business impact of failure, weighting hallucinations by their consequence, and designing human-in-the-loop workflows that catch errors early.
